name: Tournament Filter Results
description: Results from tournament-style filtering stage (LTFilter) with different L values.
method: Tournament filter - reduces candidate set before full ranking

bier_tfilter_result_{doc_num}_{num_queri.description: Tournament filter results for given document count

columns.did: Stringified list of filtered document IDs

parameters_legend.L: Tournament filter parameter - controls aggressiveness of filtering
parameters_legend.doc_num: Number of documents retained after filtering

note: doc_num = L * 259 + 1 approximately (based on tournament bracket structure)
